about_the_game:
Blockies VR is a single player action-puzzle game where you knock down block buildings and protect friendly Blockies against the forces of evil. Launch a wide range of objects at enemies in this low-poly physics world. Travel to the Kingdom’s shop to expand your weapon arsenal to take on the most difficult puzzles in all the land.

Features

  • A dozen types of blocks that interact uniquely with the world
  • A dozen AI enemy types each with their own abilities
  • Levels where you must defend the Blockies from monster attacks
  • Levels with intricate block puzzles to solve
  • The Kingdom where cool new projectiles can be purchased
  • Beautifully designed low poly environments
  • At least 10 levels with block-based and enemy-based levels

Planned Features

  • Level Editor to create and share new levels
  • Co-op and Multiplayer Functionality
  • 40 more levels

Join the Discord to learn more about future updates, and provide your own feedback of what you want in the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Blockies VR is a fast-paced, action-puzzle game where you throw projectiles. Destroy block buildings and defend friendly Blockies! Fight against all kinds of enemy monsters by throwing projectiles ranging from a silly pineapple to a destructive blackhole.
